thread.title: Miss Universe 2017 - Find Out Where & When to Watch!
thread.title_full: Miss Universe 2017 - Find Out Where & When to Watch!

author: Just Jared
title: Miss Universe 2017 - Find Out Where & When to Watch!
text:
Miss Universe is airing tonight (January 29) and we’ve got all the details! 
The annual competition is taking place in the Philippines, the home of reigning winner Pia Wurtzbach , and is set to air at 7 PM EST on FOX.
Steve Harvey will return as host of the show while model Ashley Graham will serve as a backstage corespondent. 
Performers will include Boyz II Men and Flo Rida .
The competition, which brings together some of the most beautiful and talented women from around the globe, will judge contestants in the categories of swimwear, evening gown, final question and final look.
Be sure to check back to JustJared.com to get all the details of the show and find out who’s crowned the winner!
